# Stochastic Variables
Stochastistic variables

## Probability mass function (PMF) {#sec-PMF}

$$
p_X(x) = \operatorname{P}\left(X = x\right)
$$

## Cumulative distribution function (CDF) {#sec-CDF}

$$
F_X(x) = \operatorname{P}\left(X \leq x\right)
$$

## Expected Value {#sec-Expected_Value}

$$
\begin{aligned}
    \mathbb{E}\left[X\right] &= \begin{cases}1\\2\end{cases}
\end{aligned}
$$

### Conditional Expected Value
$$
\begin{aligned}
    \mathbb{E}\left[X\right] &= \begin{cases}1\\2\end{cases}
\end{aligned}
$$

$$
\mathbb{E}\left[X\right] = \mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{E}\left[Y\mid X\right]\right]
$$

## Variance {#sec-Variance}
$$
\operatorname{Var}\left[X\right] = \mathbb{E}\left[\left(X - \mathbb{E}\left[X\right]\right)^2\right]
$$
